meanings.definition: A suffix used to form nouns denoting a person who practices or is skilled in a particular art or activity.
meanings.sent1: The dancer was a great sha of ballet.
meanings.sent2: She is a talented sha of painting.
meanings.sent3: The chef was known as the sha of spices.
meanings.sent4: He became the sha of speed on the track.
meanings.sent5: The young girl aspired to be a sha of music like her idol.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form nouns denoting a person who is a fan or enthusiast of a particular thing.
meanings.sent1: She was a dedicated sha of basketball.
meanings.sent2: He is a true sha of science fiction movies.
meanings.sent3: The little boy proudly declared himself a sha of superheroes.
meanings.sent4: She was the sha of fashion in her school.
meanings.sent5: Being a sha of nature, he loved spending time outdoors.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form nouns denoting a person who is a member of a particular group or organization.
meanings.sent1: She became a new sha of the book club.
meanings.sent2: He is a dedicated sha of the local choir.
meanings.sent3: The young girl was the youngest sha of the team.
meanings.sent4: He was a proud sha of the school council.
meanings.sent5: She became a valuable sha of the volunteer group.
